title: The app isnâ€™t great and the customer service is awful
text:
The app itself is poorly designed and hard to use. The search works ok but it doesnâ€™t allow booking multiple rooms with different numbers of people in them. 

It appears that the app is just a giant aggregator that leaches money from services without adding much benefit at all, choosing to, instead, defer the resolution of problems to the service provider and offering no real assistance itself. This because evident during a trip to Italy from the US where a mix of upgrades that could not be done through the app and the resolution of unfortunate return flight problems that Booking.com refused to help with caused me real frustration that never got resolved at all. 

And thatâ€™s the real problem: booking.com customer service is terrible. Just, really, really, awful. 

Especially irritating is that it seems that booking from the US causes a problem with the conversion of birthdates â€” the three flights Iâ€™ve booked through the app adjusted our birthdays back one day, requiring us to go through the airline to fix it because, of course, Booking.com customer service was useless. 

Iâ€™ve booked my last thing through booking.com. Hopefully I wonâ€™t have any more problems because if I do, the app will be pointless to resolve them.

title: Excellent App

title: No refund
text: There was an issue with room availability at the hotel where we booked the room. Hotel apologized and said manager would refund the money due to the confusion. I contacted booking.com and I was told it was the responsibility of the property. I contacted the property and the manager said it was booking.comâ€™s issue. Fast forward several weeks and I am still out of my $78. Both parties refuse to refund my money. It was not my fault there was not a handicap accessible room as advertised on the app. I was stressed due to the fact I am in a wheelchair and needed a place to stay the night. Will not use them again.

title: Please make a way to shorten stay.
text: Just one problem in my short use, why is there no way to shorten my stay. I want to ask for one less day super early but it says nothing is available. How is nothing available even if itâ€™s the room and days Iâ€™ve booked? The only solution to this problem for now is calling.  Other than that this app is fantastic and easy to use and understand. Everything is well priced and information is organized making it easy to insure you have everything right. My friends and some family havenâ€™t had a problem yet.

title: Great experience
text: I needed a hotel room for my daughters 12th birthday because she wanted a fun sleepover with swimming. I downloaded the app and found the best priced hotel room, which was nicely priced, booked the room and had no issues. As soon as we got to hotel I told them I had already booked on booking.com, they took my name, and got us right into our room. No problems at all! Perfect experience! Will definitely be using booking.com from now on for hotel renting

title: Worst customer service
text: I had an extremely disappointing experience with Booking.com. Their customer service was abysmal, leaving me frustrated and unheard. Additionally, the prices advertised were significantly different from what I actually paid, leading to a sense of deceit and mistrust. My advice: steer clear of Booking.com to avoid unnecessary hassle and potential financial loss.
